attributes.action: Stop the Unethical Practice of Letting Agents and Energy Companies Switching Tenants Energy Supply Without Consent
attributes.additional_details: Energy firms and letting agents up and down the country are taking advantage of generation rent. It is common practice for letting agents and energy companies to agree on an energy supplier whilst tenants are renting a property.Tenants are left with massive debt and could be registered with multiple suppliers without a single letter or phone call notifying them of the change. Please sign today to stop this unethical and exploitative practice!
